item.title: Jeremy Renner’s ‘Mayor of Kingstown’ Season 4 Sets October Premiere Date on Paramount+
item.description: “Mayor of Kingstown” will return to Paramount+ for its fourth season on October 26. The news came alongside new photos from the season, which show Jeremy Renner’s Mike McLusky opposi

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.
